Alarm field to wake up Alarm Clock program  . lead days, remind hour, remind minute to notice user before activity date at asigned time  . remark field to remind userâReceieve data from remote MS-SQL database through http protocal, which is selected by userâSendg data to remote MS-SQL database through http protocal, which is selected by userâA manual authorized system to protect remote MS-SQL databaseâuser can examine data received or sent immediately through this app or other MS-SQL data entry program
